# displayTerm

**Instance Property**

A term to display to the user to select from.

## Declaration

```swift
let displayTerm: String
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.MusicKit/documentation/MusicKit/MusicCatalogSearchSuggestionsResponse/Suggestion/searchTerm] value for the actual search.
